author: manoj
msg: autoconf: Generate modules.c based on configuration. This is the first
step to supporting selection of modules, and it seems to make --with-mpm

author: rbb
msg: Add Sendfile to APR.  This is not well tested, and a test case is needed.
I did some minor cleanup work, mainly to integrate sendfile into the APR

author: rbb
msg: Programs that build using APR no longer have access to the HAVE_FOO_H
defines.  This was causing errors in these two test programs.  Fixed now.

author: rbb
msg: Fix the logic in blocking vs non-blocking pipes to children.  It only
makes sense to change the blocking attributes of a pipe if we actually
are successful in creating the pipe.

author: rbb
msg: Helps to switch on the right variable.
